labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The client fails to reload when a different language is selected
data.expected_result: The client should reload and apply the changes
data.short_description: Discord doesn't reload after language change
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Language and switch to a different language - Notice that Discord fails to reload and changes are only applied once you start using the app
